alert.note: Alert for Coamo; Salinas; Santa Isabel (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 7:25AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Coamo, Salinas and Santa Isabel. * WHEN...Until 815 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 625 AM AST, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Coamo, Santa Isabel, Salinas, Coco, Jauca, Los Llanos, Vazquez, Las Ollas, Coqui, Playita, Mariano Colon, Parcelas Penuelas, Las Ochenta, El Ojo, La Plena, Central Aguirre, Playita Cortada and Palmarejo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
